pageTitle: Fuji Outland 29 1.0 Bike 2012 > Sale | Jenson USA
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5497=The Fuji Outland 2012 is a reliable bike loaded with dependable components, which will be certain to conquer whatever any terrain crossing the country may fling at you. The Outland 29 1.0 is strong and endurance proven, that will be definite to meet the challenge and triumph!, 7203=Summiting hills and mountain tops is all a part of the joy and seduction of mountain biking. Therefore, it is rather fitting that when Fuji was founded in 1899, it was named after Mount Fuji, a Japanese symbol of strength and endurance, and one of the most iconic and Majestic mountain peaks in the world. With that said, Fuji is a brand that believes in the core characteristics in which cycling represents; strength, endurance, challenge, and triumph. The same can be said about their bikes., 6686=The 2012 Outland 29 1.0 is held together with the A6-SL alloy frame, making it incredibly durable. The hydroformed top and down tube provide a more upright geometry for more comfort and endurance enhancement, whilst shaving off valuable weight. The Shimano Deore XT rear and front derailleur, and SLX Rapid Fire shifters make shifting smooth and effortless. The FSA afterburner 28/40 tooth crankset and FSA Press-Fit bottom bracket provide maximum transfer of power between your pistons (legs) and your drivetrain, giving you attack-like acceleration., 165604=1128}
